notes: Plays with XBox360 game pad but only with D Pad for directions (left stick disabled) and buttons are different from Windows and not configurable., i.e., X functions as A button. Game still plays fine.
title: Archon Classic

notes: Out of the box gamepad may not work right. With moltengamepad or xboxdrv it's possible to make it usable.
title: Archon Classic
